article.description: Emmett Naar had 15 points and five assists to help Saint Mary's beat UC Irvine 70-60 on Sunday night for their sixth straight victory.
article.headline: Saint Mary's beats UC Irvine 70-60 for sixth straight win
article.linkText: Saint Mary's beats UC Irvine 70-60 for sixth straight win
article.story: MORAGA, Calif. -- Emmett Naar had 15 points and five assists to help Saint Mary's beat UC Irvine 70-60 on Sunday night for their sixth straight victory. Saint Mary's started the second half on a 10-1 run, capped by Kyle Clark's 3-pointer. Dane Pineau made consecutive 3s for a 58-43 lead. Pineau finished with 14 points for Saint Mary's (6-0), which made 9 of 17 3-pointers. Clark and Joe Rahon each had 10 points. Clark made three 3-pointers and Rahon had nine assists. Aaron Wright paced UC Irvine (6-3) with 14 points. Mamadou Ndiaye had 12 points, 10 rebounds and five blocks, and Luke Nelson added 10 points. Saint Mary's shot 62.5 percent in the first half and held a 34-31 lead. Seven of UC Irvine's 11 first-half field goals were from 3-point range. The Anteaters finished 9 of 24 from distance.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
